name: saltily
content:
saltily adverb
(CONTAINING SALT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that tastes of salt, or that contains a lot of salt: Her favourite mineral water is saltily sparkling. This cheese is saltily moreish.
More examplesFewer examplesA tear trickled saltily down her cheek.The sea air was fresh and saltily tangy.The sauce should be rich brown in colour and saltily aromatic.

saltily adverb
(ANGRILY)
mainly US informal in a way that shows that you are annoyed or upset: His cold, tight-lipped face glowered saltily at the troops. "How many do you want?" she asked saltily.
More examplesFewer examplesHe wrinkled his forehead saltily and stared at her.
